userreviews.userReview: It's one of the best cartoon book series I ever read. I was about 13 years old when I read them and couldn't stop until I finished the last. By that time they were about 112 books! I love them!

description: Covers the entire spectrum of Dragonball, Dragonball Z, and Dragonball GT, including special 16-page 3-D section with 3-D glasses, character bios, cartoon episode guides, and a price guide for collector cards.
title: Total Dragon Ball Z
